abstract: United States men's national soccer team defeats Iceland, 3-2, in exhibition match.
lead_paragraph: The United States national team began rectifying the disappointment of last season by rallying for a 3-2 win over Iceland in an exhibition in Carson, Calif.

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
keywords.name: organizations

headline.print_headline: Late Goal Gives U.S. Hope That 2016 Will Be a Brighter Year
headline.main: Late Goal Gives U.S. Hope That 2016 Will Be a Brighter Year
